word_mean: 异组织的：非由该部应有组织构成的
指不同源的抗原和抗体

sentence.Network_en: This interference can be between 2 completely different viruses heterologous interference.
sentence.Network_cn: 发生在两种完全不同的病毒之间的干扰称为异种干扰.

sentence.Network_en: Each type evokes antibodies which protect against the homologous, but not heterologous virus.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一种抗原型都能产生抗同种病毒的抗体, 但对异种病毒则不能.

sentence.Network_en: This paper summarized the advance about heterologous gene high expression in E.
sentence.Network_cn: 作者综述了有关外源基因在大肠杆菌中高效表达的研究进展.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 所谓同种的(homologous)指正常见于子宫之组织,如平滑肌、内膜基质(endometrial stroma)、血管及纤维组织;异种的(heterologous)则指非子宫原有之组织,如软骨、骨、骨骼.
